Detailed Description

The OBJGroup class works on the OBJ grouping principal, with each group representing one section of the model.

It takes a set of faces and a material and converts them into a Visual Node compatible with this engine.

Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
